p: Citrus hystrix (or kaffir lime) peels and leaves were designated as CHP and CHL, respectively and were cultivated in the Bang Ramat District, Taling Chan County and Bangkok, Thailand (Latitude, Longitude: 13.777883, 100.416748). They were harvested in October and November 2019. They were extracted by maceration method using 70% ethanol (ratio 1:5 w/ v) at room temperature (RT) in the dark for 48 h and filtered. The residue was extracted twice. The two filtrates were combined and concentrated by evaporation at 45 ºC. The crude extracts were dissolved in DMSO or kept at −80 °C until further investigation.
